018package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client;
019
020import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseIOException;
021import org.apache.yetus.audience.InterfaceAudience;
022
023/*
024  Thrown whenever we are not able to get the lock within the specified wait time.
025 */
026@InterfaceAudience.Public
027public class LockTimeoutException extends HBaseIOException {
028  public LockTimeoutException(String message) {
029    super(message);
030  }
031}
